attributes.action: utilise the vast amount of set-aside land in the UK to grow bio-fuel, help farming and environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are millions of acres of land in the UK growing ungrazed grass and rubbish, the technology exists to grow and process arable crops for fuel, this fuel is carbon neutral so would help to reduce reliance on fossil fuels. It would also help british agriculture.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Greencars/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
